sentences.sContent: Nigel coaches a cricket team in his spare time.
sentences.sCn: 奈杰尔业余时间担任一个板球队的教练。

synos.tran: 教练；旅客车厢；[车辆]长途公车；四轮大马车

remMethod.val: “口吃” → 那个教练有些口吃 → 教练

trans.tranCn: 训练， 辅导， 指导
trans.tranOther: to teach a person or team the skills they need for a sport

trans.tranCn: 教练；客车车厢；长途公共汽车
trans.tranOther: someone who trains a person or team in a sport
